song_lyrics: Harijan thaīne,hānvaradh, sukh dukh manmā nav dhārīe;
Tāḷyā na taḷe, ghaṭ sāthe ghaḍīyā himmat nav hārīe...
Hari putra toy mahā dukh sahyā... Hari 2
jethī paḷ ek Nāth na rahe nyārā;
Te van bhaṭkyā laī sangdārā... Hari 3
title: Harijan thaīne hān varadh sukh dukh manmā nav dhārīe

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-399: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
